Author: GitHub
Description:
Meet GitHub Spec Kit, a new toolkit that flips how we build software. Instead of writing code first, you write executable specs that become the source of truth for your project. Learn how commands like /specify, /plan, and /implement let you describe what you want, while AI handles the details.

Check out Spec Kit on GitHub: https://github.com/github/spec-kit

#GitHub #SpecKit #SoftwareDevelopment

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: The GitHub spec kit that's flipping how we build software
